actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for the cost of removal of the trees required by the United States or a State or local government to be removed to prevent the spread of diseases caused by pests.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals an income tax deduction for expenses incurred for government-required tree removal designed to prevent the spread of pest diseases.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for the cost of removal of the trees required by the United States or a State or local government to be removed to prevent the spread of diseases caused by pests.
